description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen called FilterScreen used for selecting filter criteria in a user interface, including sections for height, weight, hair color, ethnicity, and religion. It includes UI components such as sliders, checkboxes, and buttons, and manages state for filter selections and interactions.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that presents the filter options UI, including app bar, body, and bottom navigation bar.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A stateful widget that contains the main filter UI, such as checkboxes and sliders, and manages initial scroll to a section.

classes.name: _FilterBodyState
classes.description: State class for _FilterBody, managing slider values and scrolling to initial section.

classes.name: _SectionCard
classes.description: A styled card widget used for each filter section, containing header and content.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A widget that displays section header with icon, title, and optional trailing chips.

classes.name: _HeaderChip
classes.description: A widget displaying a styled label chip with a label text.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filter provider to defaults and shows a snackbar message.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets local slider states and filter provider, then shows a snackbar message.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Builds a list of checkboxes for enum options with labels and selection handling.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names from camelCase or snake_case to human-readable labels.
